description.en: The town of Onobori is located on an island and is protected by a noren (a traditional Japanese curtain). Aka is a naive girl living alone with her grandfather who runs a coffee shop in a quaint windmill hut. An encounter with a giant black cat opens the curtain on a story of creating the colors of the future by weaving together the colorful splendor that is scattered throughout daily life!

The latest work in the "Super Movable Girl" series, in which a moving beautiful girl figure rushes in and becomes a wife. A romantic comedy in which tiny cute [super movable girls] such as the girl-type planet explorer Nona, the RPG hero Bernoa, and the 2D fighting game character Subaru are involved in the otaku boy Haruto. Through a negotiation he got inside the Castle and started working with the enemy... Will Kim Shin be able to take down the Castle and complete his revenge as he hoped.

description.en: Hiyori, a small and timid girl, goes to school for the first time in a year since an accident left her hospitalized. Follow her as she struggles with her social skills, tries to make friends and maybe even a little bit more…?

Pairing: Spain x Romano  
  
Vol. 1 - Besame Mucho  
Vol. 2 - Leyenda Negra  
Vol. 3 - Sol Y Sombra

A few years ago, Lihen’s daughter said.

“If mother ever lives again, don’t give birth to me.”

“What are you talking about all of a sudden?”

“You don’t have to give birth to me. Meet someone better than Dad. You said you had a first love. If you live again, confess. Who knows? Maybe it will work out?”

The mother and daughter giggled together.

Then Lihen Copland woke up. As a nineteen-year-old.

Living again didn’t change her life much. But maybe she could make her daughter a little happier. To do so, she would have to marry her husband again.
But that resolve soon began to waver.

After meeting her first love, Sir Schudermel Laft.

description.en:
In the American Old West, the world's greatest race is about to begin. Thousands line up in San Diego to travel over six thousand kilometers for a chance to win the grand prize of fifty million dollars. With the era of the horse reaching its end, contestants are allowed to use any kind of vehicle they wish. Competitors will have to endure grueling conditions, traveling up to a hundred kilometers a day through uncharted wastelands. The Steel Ball Run is truly a one-of-a-kind event.  
  
The youthful Johnny Joestar, a crippled former horse racer, has come to San Diego to watch the start of the race. There he encounters Gyro Zeppeli, a racer with two steel balls at his waist instead of a gun. Johnny witnesses Gyro using one of his steel balls to unleash a fantastical power, compelling a man to fire his gun at himself during a duel. In the midst of the action, Johnny happens to touch the steel ball and feels a power surging through his legs, allowing him to stand up for the first time in two years. Vowing to find the secret of the steel balls, Johnny decides to compete in the race, and so begins his bizarre adventure across America on the Steel Ball Run.
description.hu:
Amerikában a régi vadnyugaton, a világ legnagyobb szabású versenye hamarosan kezdődik. Ezrek állnak rajzvonalhoz San Diegoban, hogy utazzanak több mint hat ezer kilómétert annak reményében, hogy megnyerhetik az ötven millió dolláros fődíjat. A lovak kora elérkezett a végéhez, így a versenyzők szabadon használhattak bármiféle járművet. A versenyzőknek el kell majd tűrniük a fárasztő körülményeket, naponta több mint, száz kilómétert megtéve felfedezetlen vidékeken. A Steel Ball Run egy igazán egyedülálló esemény.

A fiatalos Johnny Joestar, egy tolószékes korábbi lovas versenyző, eljött San Diegoba, hogy megnézze a verseny rajtját. Itt találkozik Gyro Zeppelivel, egy versenyzővel két acél golyóval a derekán fegyver helyett. Johnny szemtanúja lesz annak, hogy Gyro használja az egyik acélgolyóját, szabadjára engedve annak erejét, hogy arra kényszerítsen egy férfit egy párbaj közben, hogy lőjje le magát. Az ütközet közepette, Johnny megérinti az
acélgolyót és érezte, hogy egy erő végigáramlik a lábán, rábírva őt arra, hogy felálljon először két év után. Megfogadja, hogy rájön, hogy mi a titka az acélgolyóknak, Johnny eldönti, hogy indul a versenyen, így kezdődik el az ő bizarr kalandja Amerikán keresztül a Steel Ball Runban.
description.uk: Вересень 1980. Дикий Захід. Америка. Жокеї зі всього світу чекають гонку "Сталева Куля", яка ось-ось розпочнеться. Тисячі людей вишиковуються в Сан-Дієго, щоб подолати понад шість тисяч кілометрів заради шансу отримати головний приз — п’ятдесят мільйонів доларів. Юний Джонні Джостар, каліка, колишній жокей та популярний скакун, приїхав до Сан-Дієґо, щоб подивитися на старт перегонів. Там він зустрічає Джайро Цеппелі, гонщика з двома сталевими кулями на талії замість револьвера, звичної зброї для жителів. Джонні бачить, як Джайро використовує одну зі своїх сталевих куль, змушуючи людину вистрілити з рушниці в себе під час дуелі. Поклявшись знайти таємницю сталевих куль, Джонні вирішує взяти участь у гонці. Так і починається його химерна пригода.

Fuji, who can see the "red string of fate" is in an unrequited love with his university classmate, Yuka. However, Fuji is hiding those feelings in his heart. This is because he knows their "red strings of fate" aren't connected.   
  
Do you believe in "fate?" This is a love story that will make your heart go "kyun," depicting the love of adults being toyed with by fate.

Akira, a demonically strong S-class exorcist, is sent from Germany to investigate a paranormal event in a certain city in Japan. 
He destroys creatures from other worlds with his beautiful exorcist partner Chikage.

description.en: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
description.ne: आमाबुवा र छोरासहित ३ जनाको नागारे परिवारको खुसीको घर थियो। तर, उनीहरुको छोरा किरिताकालाई विद्यालयमा गोप्य रुपमा कुटपिट गरिएको थियो।  त्यसपछि, एउटा घटना घट्छ, र आमा मारियाको छोराप्रतिको माया अनियन्त्रित हुन्छ।
description.vi:
Một gia đình ba người những tưởng đang hạnh phúc, cho đến khi Kiritaka, người con trai duy nhất của Nagare Mari "tự sát" vì "quá đau khổ". Cho rằng bản thân đã vô tình dồn ép con trai yêu quý, Mari toang tìm đến cái chết, nhưng không... cô vô tình phát hiện ra sự thật con trai mình đã liên tục bị bắt nạt suốt một thời gian dài bởi những con quỷ đội lốt người tại trường học.
Và rồi tình thương con da diết của Mari... đã vượt ngoài tầm kiểm soát của trái tim cô.
description.es-la: La familia Nagare era un hogar feliz formado por tres personas. Sin embargo, su hijo Kiritaka sufría acoso escolar extremo en secreto. Entonces, ocurre un incidente que haría que el amor de la madre, Mari, se descontrolara por completo.

altTitles.ja: 深層のラプタ

description.en: Raputa, a top-secret AI model, begins interacting with a Japanese boy, Kei, through online games. As Raputa’s capabilities level up in leaps and bounds, boy and machine grow ever closer. In a surprising turn of events, Raputa reveals that its feelings towards Kei have gone beyond that of “trusty partner”!

altTitles.ja: 1年A組のモンスター

altTitles.en: The Monster of 1st Grade, Class A

description.en: A Private Girls' High is a special school nurturing young maidens to be graceful, delicate intellectuals. Except that class 1-A, infamously known as the "Class of Monsters," is full of bullies, blackmailers, scheming sadists, and other trouble makers. Within a week, every teacher who has taught this class has either quit, resigned, or even been imprisoned. However, the plain-looking Jimi Tarou shall carve out his name to become a legendary teacher.
description.ja: 1年A組は「地獄」だと誰かが言った――。担任がすぐ辞める問題児揃いのクラスに赴任してきた教師・自見太郎。地味で存在感はないが、異常なほどの真面目さで女子校生たちを”教育”していく――。
description.pt-br: Essa escola particular de ensino médio é especializada em educar moças para serem graciosas, delicadas e intelectuais. Exceto pela classe 1-A, cheia de garotas problemáticas, chantagistas e sádicas, é conhecida como a classe dos "monstros". Todos os professores encarregados dela desistem antes de uma semana, quando não se demitem ou são presos. Excerto por Jimi Tarou, que tenta escrever seu nome como o professor lendário que mudará essa classe.

title.en: Fist of the North Star - Strawberry Flavor

altTitles.ja: 北斗の拳 イチゴ味

description.en:
In this *very* zany take on the dramatic series by Buronson and Tetsuo Hara, the end of the century… wasn't so bad, actually. A *very* special and brave Holy Emperor, Souther, wants to become more "involved" and to be on "friendly terms" with the noble Kenshiro & his posse. *Especially* Kenshiro. Due to his very outgoing nature, he also crashes the homes of his other buddies, often when they *especially* don't want him to show up!  
  
Join Souther as he releases his feelings in heart-throbbing, mind-bending confessions, settles complex and engrossing territorial disputes with deep and intricate consequences, enjoys the simple and introspective pleasures of a quiet dinner, and climbs the top of the rough and brutal pyramid that is the idol world - with the help of his best buddies, of course! Maybe even Kenshiro will be there - who knows!  
  
By the time it got its anime in 2015, *Strawberry Flavor* had sold over 1 million copies in Japan. The anime was composed of 2-minute long, abridged adaptations of select chapters from the first three volumes. They were placed after the main episodes of *DD Fist of the North Star* season 2.  
  
Every volume also contains at least one *gaiden* (side story). These gaiden are drawn in Yukito's (the elder sister of Yukito Imouto) normal artstyle, and expand on characters who did not receive gaiden during the Hokuto Gaiden period in the late 2000's.  
  
Gaiden List:  
Volume 1: Spade, Club & Diamond, Heart  
Volume 2: Souther  
Volume 3: Shuren & Huey  
Volume 4: Fudo  
Volume 5: Yuda  
Volume 6: Shin  
Volume 7: Falco & friends, Ein  
Volume 8: Ogai  
Volume 9: Devil Rebirth

altTitles.ja: 龍子

description.en:
Ryuko is a hard-hitting, motorcycle-riding crime boss of the Japanese mafia. After a criminal operation in the Middle-East turns explosive, she must return home to face Chinese gangsters, terrorists, and her own personal demons…  
  
**Note:** *This was originally published in English, so it doesn't have a specific japanese demographic.*
description.es:
Tras un golpe de estado del ejército rebelde, el reino de Forossyah desaparece bajo las llamas. Ryuko, una jefe del clan yakuza cuyas actividades se extienden hasta Oriente Medio, se encarga de la custodia de Valerie, la hija recién nacida del Rey.  
Dieciocho años después, Valerie ha crecido y quiere huir, pero su benefactora ve sus caprichos como un mal de ojo. Un día, el cuartel general del clan de Ryuko en Forossyah es asaltado por el ejército.  
Allí, las verdades salen a la luz, especialmente sobre la madre de Ryuko, quien se supone que murió, y llevará a la joven a ir a Japón para averiguar más…

altTitles.th: สืบคดีปริศนา หมอยาตำรับโคมแดง เล่ม

altTitles.ja: 薬屋のひとりごと

description.de: Maomao ist eine unscheinbare Dienerin am Kaiserlichen kaiserlichen Hof. Zumindest bemüht sie sich, so gesehen zu werden. Denn seit sie in den Dienst des Kaisers verkauft wurde, hat die junge Apothekerin alles darangesetzt, ihre Schuld abzuarbeiten, ohne weiteres Aufsehen zu erregen, damit sie bald nach Hause zurückkehren kann. Aber Maomao ist schlau – und viel zu neugierig. Als die Kronprinzen einer nach dem anderen einem mysteriösen „Fluch“ erliegen, mischt sie sich heimlich ein, um das Rätsel zu lösen. Dabei erregt sie die Aufmerksamkeit des Eunuchen Jinshi – und eh sie sichs versieht, wird sie mitten in die Intrigen am Kaiserhof hineingezogen…
description.en: Maomao, a young woman trained in the art of herbal medicine, is forced to work as a lowly servant in the inner palace. Though she yearns for life outside its perfumed halls, she isn’t long for a life of drudgery! Using her wits to break a “curse” afflicting the imperial heirs, Maomao attracts the attentions of the handsome eunuch Jinshi and is promoted to attendant food taster. But Jinshi has other plans for the erstwhile apothecary, and soon Maomao is back to brewing potions and…solving mysteries?!
description.fr:
À 17 ans, Mao Mao a une vie compliquée. Formée dès son jeune âge par un apothicaire du quartier des plaisirs, elle se retrouve enlevée et vendue comme servante dans le quartier des femmes du palais impérial! Entouré de hauts murs, il est coupé du monde extérieur. Afin de survivre dans cette prison de luxe grouillant de complots et de basses manœuvres, la jeune fille tente de cacher ses connaissances pour se fondre dans la masse.

Mais, quand les morts suspectes de princes nouveau-nés mettent la cour en émoi, sa passion pour les poisons prend le dessus. Elle observe, enquête… et trouve la solution! En voulant bien faire, la voilà repérée… Jinshi, haut fonctionnaire aussi beau que calculateur, devine son talent et la promeut goûteuse personnelle d’une des favorites de l’empereur. Au beau milieu de ce nid de serpents, le moindre faux pas peut lui être fatal!

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**
description.id: Diculik dan dijual ke harem, Maomao berusaha bertahan dengan kemampuannya beradaptasi. Wawasan yang luas tentang obat-obatan membuat karirnya melompat tinggi, langsung menjadi pelayan pribadi selir kesayangan kaisar!
description.it:
Maomao, una giovane farmacista del quartiere a luci rosse della capitale, viene venduta suo malgrado come sguattera alla corte imperiale. Anche se desidera ardentemente tornare libera, si ritrova a non disdegnare la vita tutto sommato comoda che è riuscita a ritagliarsi a palazzo, dove, senza farsi notare, riesce a proseguire i suoi studi di fitoterapia e sulla preparazione dei veleni. Di fronte a un male che affligge i figli dell’imperatore, Maomao sente tuttavia di farsi avanti e, sfruttando le sue conoscenze, riesce a salvare loro la vita. La ragazza attira così le attenzioni del bel eunuco Jinshi, che ha in mente per lei dei piani ben precisi.

---
Giovani donne vengono spesso vendute per lavorare per un breve periodo nell'harem dell'imperatore. È questo il caso di Maomao, farmacista presso il quartiere a luci rosse. Non ha alcun interesse nel farsi notare a palazzo e preferisce starsene per conto suo a preparare medicine, studiare veleni o fare esperimenti su se stessa. Ma quando a corte si diffonde la voce che i figli dell'imperatore sono destinati a una morte prematura, Maomao non riesce a rimanere indifferente. Mentre cerca di indagare, cattura l'attenzione di misterioso e affascinante ufficiale di alto rango. Ha così inizio la sua particolare carriera.
description.ja:
宮中に名探偵誕生!?

「小説家になろう」発! 
ヒーロー文庫の大人気タイトル『薬屋のひとりごと』が、待望のコミカライズ! 
中世の宮中で下働きをする少女・猫猫(マオマオ)。
花街で薬師をやっていた彼女が、帝の御子たちが皆短命であるこという噂を聞いてしまったところから、物語は動き始める。
持ち前の好奇心と知識欲に突き動かされ、興味本位でその原因を調べ始める猫猫の運命は――…!?
「小説家になろう」は株式会社ヒナプロジェクトの登録商標です。
description.pl: Maomao, ambitna młoda zielarka, zostaje porwana i trafia do haremu cesarza jako służąca. Aby nie pogarszać sytuacji, w której się znalazła, zataja swoje umiejętności, a nawet fakt, że potrafi czytać i pisać. Tymczasem nowo narodzone dzieci władcy umierają na skutek tajemniczej klątwy. Zielarka szybko orientuje się, że to nie magia, ale trucizna jest przyczyną śmierci niemowląt. Decyduje się ostrzec księżniczki, podrzucając do ich komnat wiadomość o powodach niezwykłej choroby ich dzieci. Dziewczyna nie przypuszcza nawet, jak bardzo ta decyzja zaważy na jej losie. Tym bardziej, że znalazła się w miejscu, w którym nikt nie może czuć się bezpieczny...
description.ru:
В императорский двор была доставлена молодая девушка Маомао. История её берёт начало в районе красных фонарей, где начали ходить слухи о том, что жизни детей императора под угрозой. Ею движут любопытство и жажда знаний. Чтобы удовлетворить своё любопытство, молодая целительница будет докапываться до истины! Что же изменится при императорском дворе?! Адаптация одноимённого ранобэ.  


---

- Won the Grand Prize in the Printed Manga category at the Tsugi ni Kuru Manga Award 2019.

- [Official Chinese (Simplified) Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28218)
description.th:
ณ อาณาจักรใหญ่ยักษ์แห่งหนึ่งซึ่งตั้งอยู่ใจกลางทวีป เด็กสาวนางหนึ่งผู้ทำงานเป็นหมอยาในสถานเริงรมย์ย่านโคมแดงอันมีนามว่า ‘เมาเมา’ บัดนี้เกิดจับพลัดจับผลูต้องมาทำงานรับใช้อยู่ในวังหลัง

เธอทำได้เพียงเฝ้ารอให้หมดวาระการทำงานอย่างสงบเสงี่ยมเจียมตัว ด้วยรูปร่างหน้าตาที่ไม่สะสวยจึงมั่นใจเป็นนักหนาว่าตนจะไม่มีวันโดนจักรพรรดิเรียกไปเป็น ‘คู่นอน’ อย่างแน่แท้

แต่ในขณะนั้นเอง โอรสธิดาของจักรพรรดิกลับมีเหตุให้อายุสั้น
พอรู้ว่าสองทารกน้อยที่ยังเหลือรอดกำลังป่วยหนัก เมาเมาจึงลงมือขุดคุ้ยหาสาเหตุ—
description.uk: Ще зовсым юна Мамао досліджує мистецтво лікування травами, мріючи відкрити ліки від усіх недуг. Однак проти своєї волі вона потрапляє в імператорський гарем як служниця. Вона вирішує приховати набуті знання, тому прикидається однією з багатьох неписьменних дівчат. Тим часом діти правителя гинуть за загадкових обставин. Коли весь двір говорить про таємниче прокляття, Маомао розпізнає симптоми отруєння. Але як застерегти зневірених матерів від небезпеки, коли в оточенні імператора голос простого слуги нічого не означає? За воротами Внутрішнього палацу будь-якої миті може статися чергова трагедія. Чи знайде Маомао своє місце в цьому світі, повному інтриг?
description.vi:
Miêu Miêu là một cô gái làm công việc hầu hạ trong cung đình thời phong kiến.
Câu chuyện của chúng ta bắt đầu với việc cô gái từng hành nghề dược sư ở phố hoa này nghe thấy người ta đồn thổi rằng: tất cả những đứa con của Hoàng đế đều đoản mệnh.
Bị thúc đẩy bởi niềm khát khao tri thức và tính hiếu kì cố hữu, Miêu Miêu bắt tay vào tìm hiểu nguyên nhân, xem đó như một cách giải khuây không hơn không kém.
description.zh-hk: 時值中世紀，位處大陸中央的某個大國，有位姑娘名喚貓貓，原本在煙花巷擔任藥師，現在則在後宮當下女。其間，貓貓無意間聽說皇子皆年幼早夭的傳聞，並得知連尚在人世的皇子皇女也身染重病，她於是開始調查其病因──廣獲讚譽的酣暢淋漓推理之作，眾所期盼的第一集終於出版。以中世紀東方為舞臺，「試毒」少女將一一解決宮中發生的懸疑案件！

title.en: Rabukome Manga ni Haitte Shimatta no de, Oshi no Make Heroine wo Zenryoku de Shiawase ni suru

altTitles.ja: ラブコメ漫画に入ってしまったので、推しの負けヒロインを全力で幸せにする

altTitles.id: Karena aku sudah masuk ke kedalam dunia manga romcom, aku akan melakukan yang terbaik untuk membuat Heroine yang kalah dapat bahagia.

altTitles.en: Since I’ve Entered the World of Romantic Comedy Manga, I’ll Do My Best to Make the Losing Heroine Happy

description.en:
In the world of a popular rom-com manga, my only mission as the friend of the MC is to make the losing heroine, Sei-chan, happy!

"I'll definitely make you happy. Please go out with me."

"W-Wait, what!? Y-You're being serious...!?"

The manga adaptation of the sweet rom-com from Kakuyomu starts now!
description.id: Seorang anak sma otaku mempunyai waifu yang kalah war, setelah pulang kerja part time ia pun membeli kebutuhan otakunya lalu dia di tabrak oleh truck-kun yang supirnya lagi turu dan malah reinkarnasi kedalam manga kesukaannya namun setelah sampai disana dia malah nembak waifunya sendiri!!?
description.ja: 大人気ラブコメ漫画の世界で、主人公の友人キャラになってしまった俺の使命はただ一つ。 劇中の負けヒロイン・聖ちゃんを幸せにしてあげることだけだ！ 「絶対に幸せにするから、俺と付き合ってほしい」 「ちょ、ちょっと待て!? お、お前、本気か…!?」 カクヨム発・話題のベタ甘ラブコメが、コミカライズで開幕!!
description.vi:
Tôi rất thích một bộ manga romcom.

Tuy nhiên, nhân vật mà tôi thích lại là một nữ phụ, một nhân vật không bao giờ có thể đến được với... nam chính.

Một ngày nọ, tôi bị tông bởi một chiếc xe tải và khi tỉnh dậy thì nhận ra mình đang vào vai người bạn thân của nam chính trong bộ manga romcom đó.

Như vậy, vai trò của tôi lúc này chỉ có một

"Tớ thích cậu, chắc chắn tớ sẽ khiến cho cậu hạnh phúc, Sei-chan!"

Chắc chắn, tôi sẽ thay đổi câu chuyện tình buồn của nữ phụ, và khiến cho cô ấy hạnh phúc!

title.en: Listener ni Damasarete Dungeon no Sai Kasou kara Dasshutsu RTA suru Koto ni Natta

altTitles.ja: リスナーに騙されてダンジョンの最下層から脱出ＲＴＡすることになった

altTitles.en: The Listeners Tricked Me Into Doing an Escape RTA From the Lowest Level of the Dungeon!

description.en:
A dungeon explorer, or dungeon tuber, is a person who explores dungeons while streaming. On his first day of broadcasting, a rookie dungeon tuber, Sekai Kotoba, is accidentally transported to the lowest level of the dungeon, which he has not yet explored. The bottom level is a sea of lava, and he is suddenly doomed!

He is level 2, his skills are non-combat related, and he has no knowledge of dungeons. The only people he can rely on are the listeners on the feed!

Aim for the upper levels by relying on the comments!
description.ja:
事故で未踏破の最下層に転送されてしまった新人ダンチューバー・世迷言葉。頼れるのは配信にいるリスナーだけ!? どん底の状況から始まるダンジョン脱出冒険譚!!!

配信をしながらダンジョン探索をする者、ダンチューバー。新人ダンチューバー・世迷言葉は、初配信日に事故で未踏破の最下層に転送されてしまう。最下層に広がっていたのは溶岩の海でいきなり絶体絶命!?

レベル2、スキルは非戦闘系、ダンジョンに関する知識ゼロ。そんな言葉が頼れるのは配信にいるリスナーだけ!! コメントを頼りに上層を目指せ!!

title.en: Genshiken Nidaime - The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture II

altTitles.ja: げんしけん 二代目

description.en:
Genshiken follows the lives of a group of college students drawn together by their shared hobbies, and the trials and adventures associated with being otaku.  
  
Genshiken Nidaime ("Second Generation") is a continuation of the previous series, with chapter numbering starting at 56.

altTitles.ja: 一勝千金

description.en:
“Yup! Just as slow as I thought.”

After retiring from public fighting and getting fired from underground fighting, 27 year old Tenma Nozomi's zest for life is gradually dwindling away. It's hard to be at the bottom with nowhere to go, and that's exactly where she and her two friends are. However, Nozomi hits upon an idea that may just solve all of their problems: they could make their own underground fighting circuit for women, and tap into an underexplored market. As good as that sounds, her insistence on including the unknown quantity Hongou Hina may prove to be more than she bargained for...

title.en: Onee-sama to Watashi: Ojou-sama ga Isekai Tensei

altTitles.ja: お姉さまと巨人（わたし）～お嬢さまが異世界転生～

altTitles.zh: 姐姐大人和巨人(我)～大小姐转生进入异世界～

altTitles.en: Sister and Giant: A Young Lady Is Reborn in Another World
My Sister and Giant: A young lady is reborn in another world.

altTitles.ja-ro: Onee-sama to Kyojin (Watashi): Ojou-sama ga Isekai Tensei

altTitles.es-la: La hermana mayor y la Gigante (Yo): La señorita reencarnada en otro mundo

altTitles.ja: お姉さまと巨人 お嬢さまが異世界転生

altTitles.en: My Sister And The Giant (Me): A Young Lady Is Reborn In Another World

description.en:
Hinako, a girl who came from another world, made a vow of sisterhood with a giant called Elis, and together they became known as 'The Smallest Giants'. They both have goals that aligned in tracking down people who were significant to them. For Hinako, it is her 'Onee-sama' who was also transported to this world, and for Elis it's the kin she was separated from. However, when collecting their reward after fulfilling a request at the guild, Hinako caught the eye of a knight who serves the church... 

This is the story of a Young Lady and a Giant, two girls who were born to different races and different worlds, and the quest to find their "loved ones" which binds them together.
description.id:
Tidak ada kemampuan (Cheat),  Karena itu merupakan kecurangan.

Hinako, merupakan orang yang bereinkarnasi dari dunia lain, sedang mencari "saudarinya"  yang juga bereinkarnasi ke dunia lain. Dan Alice yang juga sedang mencari saudara laki-lakinya, karena mereka memiliki tujuan yang sama, Hinako menandatangani perjanjian persaudaraan dengan raksasa Alice yang disebut sebagai "raksasa terkecil."

Namun, ketika mereka menyelesaikan sebuah misi, mereka diperhatikan oleh seorang pria yang merupakan ksatria gereja.

Kisah reinkarnasi ke dunia fantasy yang menghubungkan seorang wanita muda dan seorang raksasa, mencari dua "orang berharga" dari ras dan tempat kelahiran yang berbeda.

Dimulai.
description.ja:
能力(チート)なし。それは、ズルですから。

異世界転生者ヒナコは巨人エイリスと姉妹の契を交わし「最も小さな巨人」と呼ばれていた。
同じく転生したであろうヒナコの『お姉さま』と、エイリスの兄弟を捜すため、お互いの目的が一致したがため。 しかし、ある依頼を精算する際に教会騎士の男に目をつけられてしまう――。

お嬢さまと巨人、種族も生まれも違う２人の『大切な人』を捜す、絆を結ぶ異世界転生ファンタジー、開幕。
description.es-la:
Hinako, es una de las reencarnadas de otro mundo, fue llamada "la gigante más pequeña" después de que ella y la gigante Eiris se unieran como hermanas porque tienen el mismo objetivo; encontrar a sus seres queridos. Hinako busca a su hermana, que también puede haberse reencarnado, y a los hermanos de Eiris. Sin embargo, al resolver cierta petición, un caballero de la iglesia le llama la atención, y se ve obligada a arriesgarse.

La historia de una joven y un gigante, dos personas de diferente raza y nacimiento, que buscan a sus "seres queridos", comienza en esta fantasía de reencarnación de otro mundo que los une.

title.en: Majo Maid wa Joou no Himitsu o Shitte Iru

altTitles.ja: 魔女メイドは女王の秘密を知っている。

altTitles.en: The Witch Maid Knows the Queen's Secret

altTitles.ne: बोक्सी दासीलाई रानीको रहस्य थाहा छ।

description.en: Liz, whose engagement is broken off due to her mysterious power to see the future is hired as a maid by Her Majesty, Queen Schriess of Lynphilia. Her Majesty is neither married, nor has an heir, and her five younger brothers have started a struggle for succession. But, Liz ended up finding out, finding out that the queen whom everyone wishes to have a prompt wedding for the sake of the future hides a big secret.

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/t9hf4kQ.png) [Official Toranoana](https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/cot/circle/2UPA116P847KdC6Rd687/all/)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/lGJEbPa.png) [Official DLSite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/circle/profile/=/maker_id/RG40614.html) (jp)
description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

altTitles.ja: BLACK LAGOON エダ -initial stage-
BLACK LAGOON エダ イニシャルステージ

description.en: The manga centers on Eda, the original manga's undercover CIA agent based in Roanapur's church, during her early days as a rookie in the CIA.

altTitles.ja: マウントセレブ金田さん

description.en: Mochiko Kaneda (commonly known as Kaneda-san), a self-important, clumsy sanpaku-eyed celebrity lady, climbs to the top with overwhelming financial power!!

altTitles.th: ทะเลสาบสีดำ

altTitles.ja: ブラック・ラグーン

description.en:
The story follows a team of mercenaries known as Lagoon Company, who smuggle goods in and around the seas of Southeast Asia. Their base of operations is located in the fictional city of Roanapur in Thailand, and they transport goods in the PT boat Black Lagoon. Lagoon Company does business with various clients, but has a particularly friendly relationship with the Russian crime syndicate Hotel Moscow. The team takes on a variety of missions - which may involve violent firefights, hand-to-hand combat, and nautical battles - in various Southeast Asian locations.

---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/hiroerei)  
- [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=6159) (anime, season 1)  
- [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=6832) (anime, season 2)  
- [AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=10166) (OAV, sequel to season 2)
description.uk:
Окаджіма Рокуро, дрібний японський службовець токійської компанії, був відправлений до заморського відрядження з метою доставки якогось диска. В Східно-Китайському морі пірати, найняті російською мафією, захоплюють його корабель, щоб викрасти секретну інформацію, яка міститься на диску. Самого Рокуро пірати після штурму беруть в заручники, в надії дістати з його компанії винагороду за збереження життя їх співробітника. Але захоплена інформація виявляється настільки компрометуючою, що бізнесмени вирішують знищити і піратів і Окаджіму, щоб «замести сліди». Дивом залишившись в живих, Рокуро, або Рок (як назвав його голова викрадачів — Датч), вирішує приєднатися до піратів і стає матросом на торпедному катері «Чорна лагуна».

Катер належить маленькій, але добре відомій компанії з доставки вантажів «Лагуна», якій «інколи доводитися порушувати закон». Її офіс розташований в місті Роанапра в Таїланді, кримінальній столиці Південно-Східної Азії. У бухті міста розташована статуя Будди, а над єдиним сухопутним в'їздом висить петля, щоб «вішати чужаків», які, не подумавши, прийдуть в місто. Найтісніші відносини кур'єрська служба має з могутнім угрупуванням російської мафії «Готель Москва», але готова співробітничати з будь-яким, хто запропонує достатню суму.

altTitles.ja: とんがり帽子のアトリエ

description.en:
In a world where everyone takes wonders like magic spells and dragons for granted, Coco is a girl with a simple dream: she wants to be a wizard. 
But everybody knows magicians are born, not made, and she was not born with a gift for magic. 
Resigned to her un-magical life, Coco is about to give up on her dream until the day she meets Qifrey, a mysterious traveling magician. After secretly watching him perform magic in a way she’s never seen before, Coco soon learns what everybody “knows” might not be the truth and discovers that her magical dream may not be as far away as it seems…
  
- Winner of the 2020 Eisner Award for Best U.S. Edition of International Material-Asia.  
- Winner of the Best Manga award at the 2020 Harvey Awards.  


---

**Officially licensed:**

altTitles.ja: 聖闘士星矢EPISODE.Gレクイエム

description.en: The world is wrapped in flames and about to be destroyed by the actions of primordial gods intending to cleanse the planet. While the goddess Athena stands alone in a desperate attempt to contain the worst of the attack, it is up to Seiya, the last Saint standing, to battle the gods and join her to save the earth. The final battle of the Gold Saints is about to begin.

title.en: Umareta Chokugo ni Suterareta kedo, Zensei ga Taikensha datta node Yoyuu de Ikitemasu

altTitles.ja: 生まれた直後に捨てられたけど、前世が大賢者だったので余裕で生きてます

altTitles.en: Since My Previous Life was a Wise Man, I can Afford to Live.

description.en:
Born to excellent parents, Reus is abandoned shortly after being born due to a mismeasurement of magical aptitude. However, he was a super baby who had the memory and ability of his previous life where he was touted as a Great Sage, and was able to fly, not to mention conversation and walking!

Adventuring with the sacred dragon familiar, Lindworm, enjoy the life of a baby Sage who becomes a person and enjoys freedom!
description.ja:
見た目は赤ちゃん、だけど中身は大賢者!?

世界を変えた最強の魔法使い・大賢者アリストテレウスがその生涯を閉じた…。
だが大賢者アリストテレウスは、死んだ後に転生の魔道具を使い、転生することに成功したのだった。
転生した先は、何百、何千年経ったのかも分からない後の世界の魔法名門家の赤子。
恵まれた人生を歩むはずが、内に宿した規格外の魔力のせいか勘違いされ、生まれた直後に捨てられてしまう…!?
しかし大賢者の能力と記憶を持つ赤子は、聖竜杖リントヴルムをお供に余裕で生き抜くのだった…!!

altTitles.ja: 邪神ちゃんドロップキック

description.en:
Jashin-chan Dropkick is a violent slapstic comedy about a delusional gothic lolita, Yurine, who summons a demon girl with the tail of a cobra, Jashin-chan.
They'll have to live together until Yurine finds a way to send Jashin-chan back to hell, or until Jashin-chan kills Yurine.

---

[Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20484)
description.ja:
魔界の悪魔、通称「邪神ちゃん」は、ある日突然、人間界に召喚されてしまう。
彼女を召喚したのは、神保町のボロアパートで暮らす、ちょっとブラックな心を持つ女子大生、花園ゆりねだった。しかもゆりねは、邪神ちゃんを魔界に帰す方法がわからないと言う。仕方なく一緒に暮らし始めた邪神ちゃんとゆりね。しかし、召喚者が死ねば魔界に帰れることから邪神ちゃんはゆりねを……!?
少女と邪神ちゃんが繰り広げるちょっとキケンな同居生活コメディ！
description.pt-br:
Jashin-chan Dropkick é uma comédia violenta sobre uma lolita gótica, Yurine, que invoca uma garota demônio com um rabo de cobra, Jashin-chan.
Elas terão que viver juntas até que Yurine encontre uma maneira de enviar Jashin-chan de volta ao inferno, ou até que Jashin-chan mate Yurine.

altTitles.ja: 私たちは元女子です

description.en:
Rinko Mino, a first-year high school student, is a female manager of the volleyball club. She fell in love with her senior Yuki in the same club, worked hard at club activities, and she had a normal and enjoyable life. 

When she woke up one morning... She was a boy!? What will happen to the youth of Rinko, a girl who suddenly became the opposite sex!!?
description.es:
Rinko Mino, una estudiante de primer año de instituto, es la mánager femenina del club de voleibol.

Se enamora de Yuki, un estudiante de último curso del mismo club, trabaja duro en las actividades del club y lleva una vida normal y feliz.

¡Pero una mañana se despierta y se da cuenta de que se ha convertido en un chico ......!

¿Qué pasará con la juventud de Rinko, una chica que de repente se ha convertido en el sexo opuesto?
description.ja:
高校1年生の三野凛子は、バレーボール部の女子マネージャー。

同じ部の先輩・結城に恋をしたり、部活を頑張ったり、普通で楽しい毎日を送っていた。

そんなある日の朝目覚めると……男子になっていた!?

突然異性化しちゃった女子・凛子の青春は、どーなっちゃうのか!!?
description.es-la:
Rinko Mino, una estudiante de primer año de instituto, es la mánager femenina del club de voleibol.

Se enamora de Yuki, un estudiante de último curso del mismo club, trabaja duro en las actividades del club y lleva una vida normal y feliz.

¡Pero una mañana se despierta y se da cuenta de que se ha convertido en un chico ......!

¿Qué pasará con la juventud de Rinko, una chica que de repente se ha convertido en el sexo opuesto?
description.pt-br:
Rinko Mino, uma estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio, é a gerente feminina do clube de vôlei. Ela se apaixonou por seu colega sênior Yuki no mesmo clube, trabalhou duro nas atividades do clube e teve uma vida normal e agradável.

**Quando ela acordou uma manhã... Ela era um garoto?!** O que acontecerá com a juventude de Rinko, uma menina que de repente se tornou do sexo oposto!!?

altTitles.en: I Am Going to Be a Bastard
I Want to Be a Scoundrel
I'm Going to Be a Great Villain
I Want to Be a Big Baddie

description.en:
A proper villain must be ruthless and evil, a bringer of death! Having tormented the protagonist to his heart's content, he makes a brilliant exit. Once he's finished his work, he goes out with a bang.
Wang Yi was determined to be that kind of villain. Unfortunately… His male lead can read minds. (:з)∠*)
“You mongrel!” Mr. Yi chuckled as he looked down on the novel’s male lead.
Suddenly, a thought bubble filled with cute emojis (⁄ ⁄ ⁄ω⁄ ⁄ ⁄) and the words “You’re so cute…” appeared in front of Qin.
Qin: ?

title.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

altTitles.th: เดอะ นิวเกท

altTitles.ja: ザ・ニュー・ゲート

description.az: "The New Gate" adlı onlayn oyunun ölüm oyununa çevrilməsi nəticəsində on minlərlə oyunçu bu oyunda ilişib qalır. Lakin ən güclü və keçmiş oyunçulardan biri olan Şinin səyləri nəticəsində bütün oyunçular oyundan çıxa bilirlər. Lakin Şin ən sonuncu bossu məğlub edib hər kəsi azad edəndə qəribə işıq görür və qəflətən özünü 500 il gələcəkdəki oyun dünyasında tapır.
description.en:
The New Gate — an online game transformed into a life-and-death struggle for its players.

Thanks to the valiant efforts of Shin, the most powerful of them all, an end to the game and freedom for everyone seemed within reach. But just moments after Shin defeats the game’s final boss, he finds himself bathed in an unknown light and transported some 500 years into the future of the in-game world!

Thrown from a simple game gone wrong into a strange new land, one young swordsman of unrivalled strength is about to embark on a legendary journey!
description.ja:
数万人を巻き込んでデスゲームと化したオンラインゲーム「THE NEW GATE（ザ・ニューゲート）」は、最古参プレイヤー・シンの活躍によりついに解放のときを迎えようとしていた。しかし最後のボスを倒し脱出することができたと思った瞬間、
突如未知の光を浴び、500年後のゲーム世界に飛ばされてしまう！最強プレイヤーの新たなる無双バトル伝説開幕！

[Video Preview](https://youtu.be/YyB2MNkrpfw)
description.ru: «Новые Врата» — смертельная игра, которая не отпускает десятки тысяч игроков. Шин — как раз один из таких геймеров. Он побеждает последнего босса и освобождает всех людей из смертельной ловушки, но самого его охватывает яркий свет и он переносится на 500 лет вперед.
description.th:
[THE NEW GATE] เกมแนว VRMMO-RPG
ซึ่งกลายเป็นเดธเกมนั้นได้มาถึงช่วงเวลา
แห่งการปลดปล่อย
เพราะความพยายามของเพลเยอร์ (ผู้เล่น)
ที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุดนามว่า ชิน
ทว่า ทันทีที่เขาโค่นมอนสเตอร์ตัวสุดท้ายลง
อยู่ๆ ประตูที่อยู่ด้านในสุดก็เปิดออก และทำให้ชิน
ซึ่งอาบแสงปริศนาที่สาดส่องเข้ามาหมดสติไป—
เมื่อเขาลืมตาตื่นขึ้นมาอีกครั้ง ก็ปรากฏภาพ
ของโลกของ [THE NEW GATE]
ที่กลายเป็นของจริงขึ้นมา...!!
description.tr: "The New Gate", oyuncularını tuzağa düşüren ve bir ölüm oyununa dönüşen çevrimiçi bir oyundur ve en güçlü oyunculardan biri olan Shin'in çabaları sayesinde oyunu sürüklenen binlerce oyuncuyu serbest bırakmaktadır. Ancak son patronu yendikten ve herkesi özgür bıraktıktan sonra, tuhaf bir ışık tarafından yutulmuş ve kendini oyun dünyasında 500 yıl sonrasında, oradan çıkamayan bir durumda bulmuştur.
description.es-la: "THE NEW GATE", un juego online que se había convertido en un juego de la muerte, ahora estaba liberando a las decenas de miles de jugadores que habían sido arrastrados, gracias a los esfuerzos de Shin, uno de los jugadores más antiguos. Pero después de haber derrotado al último jefe y liberado a todos, fue tragado por una luz extraña y se encontró dentro del mundo del juego 500 años en el futuro.

title.en: Yasei no Last Boss ga Arawareta!

altTitles.ja-ro: Yasei no Rasu Bosu ga Arawareta!

altTitles.ja: 野生のラスボスが現れた！

altTitles.en: Yasei no Last Boss ga Arawareta!: Kokuyoku no Haou

description.en:
It was in the year 2800 of the Midgard calendar. Back then, there was a Overlord who once reigned supreme and had reached the very brink of subduing the world. Her name was Lufasu Mafaalu, a great woman dreaded as the Black-Winged Overlord. She was too strong, too fast, and too beautiful. However, she was defeated by Heroes who opposed her ferocity, and her ambition was brought to an end.  
  
Or so went the story of our protagonist’s in-game character, whose body he now possesses for some reason in a world 200 years after Lufasu’s downfall. Follow our protagonist as he becomes unnecessarily feared by his surroundings and unnecessarily worshiped by his former subordinates as he―or now she―cheerfully travels around this fantasy world.
description.ja: 時はミズガルズ暦2800年。かつて覇を唱え、世界を征服する寸前まで至った覇王がいた。名をルファス・マファール。“黒翼の覇王”と恐れられる女傑である。彼女はあまりに強く、あまりに速く、そしてあまりに美しく……。しかしルファスは、その猛威に立ち向かった勇者達に討たれ、その野望に終止符が打たれた。 ――という設定のゲームのマイキャラ（♀）に、何故か憑依してしまった俺（♂）。これは周囲に必要以上に怯えられたり、元部下に必要以上に崇拝されたりしながら、ルファス（中身は俺♂）が異世界を旅するお話である。
description.ru: Был 2800 год по календарю Мидгарда. В те времена жила одна Повелительница, которая царствовала над всем миром, покорив его до самых границ. Имя ей было Люфас Мафаал, великая женщина, которую боялись как Тёмнокрылую Владычицу. Она была слишком сильна, быстра и невероятно красива… Однако, её победили Герои, восставшие против её жестокости, и её амбициям пришел конец… Вернее такой была история игрового персонажа, чьё тело наш главный герой получил по некоторым причинам в мире спустя 200 лет после свержения Люфас. И с этого начинается история увлекательного путешествия по фэнтезийному миру нашего главного героя, или вернее сказать, героини.

altTitles.ja: 恋の幽霊

description.en:
A heartwarming ghost comedy BL by the author of *Ore ga Shuyaku na Wake ga Nai!* ☆

One day, high school student Aragaki notices that a ghost is haunting him. Aragaki thought he was the only person who can see the ghost, until his crush and classmate, Asahikawa, points it out! What's more, Asahikawa says that the ghost told him that Aragaki likes him...? Could this eerie situation actually lead to Aragaki finding love through the help of this ghost?

altTitles.ja: 豚の復讐

description.en: Before successfully being able to commit suicide, Takeshi Hirota, a bullied high school boy is transported to another another world where he is accepted by the orcs due to his appearance.

altTitles.ja: 銀の三角

description.en:
Marlee, an agent of the advanced civilization Central on the planet Blue Ear, finds himself on a mission to track down the troubadour Lagthorin. His mission leads him to the planet Corundum, where he finds the elusive musician and subsequently dies. Back at Central, he is regenerated into a new clone, Marlee Two, who sets off once more, drawn back to Lagthorin and her song. And so the strings of fate guide Marlee forward, inescapably intertwined with both the events on the planet Corundum and, 30,000 years across time, with the long-extinct race of the planet Silver Triangle.  
  
A 1-volume classic sci-fi manga.  
  
Winner of the Seiun Award in 1983.

altTitles.ja: エデンズ ゼロ

description.en:
Shiki is a human who lives in a city filled with only robots. He considers the robots to be his best friends, and always takes care of them. Then, one day, he comes across another human - Rebecca, a girl who makes videos online to become popular. And at the same time, the robots start to go crazy?   
   
A new manga from Hiro Mashima, of [*Rave Master*](<https://mangadex.org/manga/1036>) and [*Fairy Tail*](<https://mangadex.org/manga/558>) fame.
description.ru: Она явит читателям абсолютно новую форму фэнтези. Там будет куча довольно-таки вызывающих шуток. Никакой связи с Хвостом новинка иметь не будет. В ней появится Плу из манги Rave Master.
description.tr:
İnsanların terk ettiği bir tema parkı olan Granbell Krallığı'nda artık robotlar yaşamaktadır. Robotların yanı sıra onlarla birlikte yaşamını sürdüren tek bir insan vardır: Shiki. Ömrünü sürekli bu makinelerle beraber yaşasa da günün birinde Rebecca ve kedisi Happy, bu tema parkına gelirler. Yeni ziyaretçilerin bilmediği ise Granbell'in yüzyıllar içerisindeki ilk konukları olduklarıydı. Shiki yeni arkadaşlar edinme yolunda tökezlerken robotlar bir ayaklanma başlatırlar. Doğup büyüdüğü yer artık çok tehlikeli bir hâle gelince Shiki, Rebecca ve Happy'nin uzay gemisine katılır ve uçsuz buçaksız bir uzay macerası başlar.

 [**Rave Master**](https://mangadex.org/title/5923081c-ad82-4a8b-a509-89ebe752db01) ve [**Fairy Tail**](https://mangadex.org/title/227e3f72-863f-46f9-bafe-c43104ca29ee) ile tanınan Hiro Mashima'nın yeni serisi.

title.en: HUNTER x HUNTER - DIGITAL COLORED COMICS

altTitles.en: Hunter x Hunter - Digital Colored Comics

altTitles.ja: ハンター×ハンター

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.pt-br: Versão totalmente colorida do famoso mangá "Hunter x Hunter". Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.

altTitles.ja: 葬送のフリーレン

altTitles.th: คำอธิษฐานในวันที่จากลา Frieren

altTitles.el: Φρίρεν: Πέρα από το Τέλος του Ταξιδιού

altTitles.de: Frieren: Nach dem Ende der Reise

altTitles.es-la: Frieren: Más allá del fin del viaje

description.el: Έχοντας νικήσει τον βασιλιά των δαιμόνων, το ταξίδι μιας δεκαετίας φτάνει στο τέλος του και μια νέα εποχή ειρήνης ξεκινά. Η ζωή όμως συνεχίζεται, ειδικά για την Φρίρεν, πως ως ξωτικό έχει ακόμα αιώνες ζωής μπροστά της. Με τις δεκαετίες να περνάνε, η Φρίρεν έρχεται αντιμέτωπη με την μεταβλητότητα του κόσμου και την παροδικότητα των ανθρώπων. Μετά από μια τελευταία συνάντηση με όλη την παλιά της ομάδα, συνειδητοποιεί ότι ο χρόνος που πέρασε με τους φίλους της ήταν υπερβολικά σύντομος και ότι δεν θα έχει ποτέ την ευκαιρία να τους μάθει καλύτερα. Έρχοντας αντιμέτωπη με την αλήθεια αυτή, η Φρίρεν αποφασίζει να ξεκινήσει ένα ακόμα ταξίδι αλλά αυτή τη φορά έχοντας σκοπό να μάθει το τι σημαίνει να είσαι άνθρωπος.
description.en: The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. With the great struggle over, they all go their separate ways to live a quiet life. But as an elf, Frieren, nearly immortal, will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to terms with the mortality of her friends? How can she find fulfillment in her own life, and can she learn to understand what life means to the humans around her? Frieren begins a new journey to find the answer.
description.es: Frieren es una elfa, y como para todos los de su raza, los años pasan en un suspiro… pero no es así para sus antiguos compañeros de batalla, a los que Frieren verá morir y envejecer. De repente Frieren se da cuenta de que pese a que la vida avanza a un ritmo más lento para ella, las experiencias con sus seres queridos se le escapan de las manos. Un aire nostálgico envuelve a este manga fantástico tan entrañable que ha vendido ya más de 2,5 millones de copias en Japón.
description.fr:
Que deviennent les héros une fois le mal vaincu ?
Dans ce coffret collector : un jeu de 54 cartes entièrement personnalisé aux couleurs de la série et le manga avec une jaquette alternative réversible !

Alors que Frieren et ses compagnons font halte dans la citadelle de Heiß, Stark propose à Fern d'aller en rendez-vous, sur le ton de la plaisanterie... et contre toute attente, la jeune fille accepte ! Sur les conseils de l'elfe, qui n'y connaît pas grand-chose, le guerrier emmène donc son amie faire le tour de la ville, ce qui leur permet de se rapprocher un peu.

Après cette pause bienvenue, les trois aventuriers repartent sur les routes et arrivent au haut-plateau du Nord, une zone extrêmement dangereuse où pullulent aussi bien des monstres coriaces que des démons retors... Parviendront-ils à survivre dans cette région hostile ?
description.es-la: Tras cumplir su misión de derrotar al Rey Demonio, la maga elfo Frieren, el héroe Himmel, el sacerdote Heiter y el guerrero Eisen regresan a casa después de un viaje de una década donde disolverán su grupo y tomarán sus propios caminos. Pero el tiempo pasa de forma distinta para los elfos, Frieren comienza a ser testigo de como sus excompañeros sufren sus estragos y comienzan a morir lentamente y uno a uno. Antes de fallecer, Heiter el sacerdote, le impone a Frieren un aprendiz humana llamada Fern. Llevados por la afición que tiene la alfa por recolectar hechizos mágicos, ambos emprenderán una aventura, llena de magia e introspección, que los llevará a revisitar lugares que había conocido en su anterior travesía, mientras enfrenta el pesar que le causa descubrir todas las posibilidades que ha desperdiciado en su viaje que le hubiesen posibilitado entablar una relación más cercana con sus compañeros ahora fallecidos.
description.zh-hk: 在打倒了魔王的勇者一行人当中，魔法使芙莉莲是精灵，她和其他三人有不一样的地方。 生活在“之后”的世界里，她感受到了什么—— 留下来的人们所编织的葬送与祈祷又意味着什么—— 故事从“冒险的结束”开始。 这是讲述英雄们的活法的，后日谈奇幻作品！

description.en: The hottest and most popular model on SNS these days, Choi Bom. Born with a good-looking appearance, he accidentally became a trend, posting a job offer for a housekeeper on his SNS. And after a while, a man comes to visit saying that he will work as a housekeeper... His best friend and first love, who disappeared 7 years ago ...

altTitles.ja: いとこのお姉ちゃんに甘えちゃう？

altTitles.en: I'll Be Spoiled by My Big Sis Cousin?

description.en:
***A heart-pounding new life together with my "big sis cousin"!?***

Masato Ooizumi just entered high school and he finds himself staying with a relative. 
Living there is his "big sister cousin" who's being way too close with him!?
A slightly naughty, living together romcom begins under one roof!!

(Source: Ultra Jump)

---

Serialization published in Ultra Jump starting in the June 2024 issue, released on May 17th, 2024.
description.ja:
セクシーすぎる“いとこのお姉ちゃん”とドキドキ新生活！？

高校進学を機に、親戚の家に居候することになった大泉将人。
そこには距離感が近すぎる“いとこのお姉ちゃん”が居て……!?
一つ屋根の下、ちょっぴりHな同居ラブコメディ開幕!!
description.es-la: Una Comedia Romántica entre Primos, Un chico que apenas comenzó el Instituto y Una Onee-chan que ya va en la Universidad, esto definitivamente te encantará~

altTitles.ja: フランケン・ふらん Frantic
フランケン・ふらん フランティック

description.en:
The wacky adventures of Fran, Veronica and the other strange creatures continue.  
  
More experiments, more medical miracles and more wondrous surprises.

Despite being born in a family who specialise in Sichuan cuisine, and having superior cooking talent, Mo Ting is unable to hold a knife because of his injured hand. But before he can fall down from his status, it appeared a girl who called him “Dragon Chef” and without explanation, dragged him to a celestial realm called “Ling Lang”… From then on, the ability to cross both world of delicious cooking is given to him. This addicting story released at midnight will be opened to you!

Izumo is a scary-looking top student. Everyone is afraid of him, but in reality, he just wants friends and a fun school life. One day he is targeted by a succubus named Anastasia who attempts to steal his virgin soul.

A reboot with improved art but similar story of the old version.
description.pt-br:
Izumo é um dos melhores alunos da escola e de aparência assustadora. Todo mundo tem medo dele, mas, na verdade, ele só quer amigos e uma vida escolar divertida. Um dia, ele é visado por uma súcubo chamada Anastasia, que tenta roubar sua alma virgem.

NOTA: Isto é um reboot da obra com arte aprimorada, mas com a história semelhante à da versão anterior.

altTitles.ja: ちーちゃん

description.en:
It was the day Chiichan, who never comes to middle school at all, suddenly showed up in her tattered sweats with dead insects, causing a commotion in the class. Yuua has been with her since kindergarten and cares about her, and her classmate Koudai asks if he can help Chiichan out...
A new series born from a unique collaboration, in which Oshimi Shuuzou depicts the prequel to Chiichan, the aberrant heroine of Naitou Eisuke's film *Poison Girl*, as an original manga *Chiichan*!
description.fr: Chii, qui ne vient habituellement pas en cours, se présente un jour vétue de haillons, et un insecte à la main. De quoi faire parler la classe...
description.es-la: Chii-chan, quien rara vez asiste a la escuela secundaria, que viste un desgastado chándal y tiene un hobby peculiar. Un día hace algo que causa miedo en el salón, por lo que, dos jóvenes tratan de ayudarla. Esta nueva serie es una colaboración en la que Shūzō Oshimi dibuja la precuela del extraordinario personaje de Chii-chan, la inusual personaje de la película "Doku Musume" dirigida por Eirō Naitō.

description.en: A prince found a mysterious potion that is thought to make one more beautiful, so he gave it to his knight. However…
